channel.title: 317 client.. original, help?
channel.description:
hi when i try to login on my 317 server with an original 317 client, it kicks me off after logging me in, saying something about a t2 error
with like 126,126,126 - 30,0,0
repeated.
I really wanna log in and see fally etc as it used to be back when i played in 2004?
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 10:16:38 am[/size][hr]Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 13,0,0 - 64,121,101,108,64,68,97,110,99,101,10,72,127,
thats what it says..

item.title: 317 client.. original, help?
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

u can always try the 127.0.0.1 the local host or 0.0.0.0

those work

if not get a new client/source

Read full topic
